meanings.definition: The quality or state of being implicit.
meanings.sent1: The implicitnesses of the agreement were clear to everyone involved.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the implicitnesses of his gestures towards her.
meanings.sent3: The implicitnesses of the puzzle made it both frustrating and fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: The implicitnesses of the forest whispered secrets to those who listened closely.
meanings.sent5: The implicitnesses of the painting left viewers in awe of its hidden meanings.

meanings.definition: The implicit nature or quality of something.
meanings.sent1: His speech was filled with the implicitnesses of his true intentions.
meanings.sent2: The implicitnesses of her smile revealed more than words ever could.
meanings.sent3: The implicitnesses of the recipe made it seem like a magic potion.
meanings.sent4: The implicitnesses of the night sky held the dreams of all who gazed at it.
meanings.sent5: The implicitnesses of the old house told stories of its past inhabitants.
